original_text: And he presented the grain offering, took a handful of it, and burned it on the altar, besides the burnt offering of the morning.
korean_text: 또 소제를 드리되 그 중에서 그의 손에 한 움큼을 채워서 아침 번제물에 더하여 제단 위에서 불사르고

sentences.original_text: And he presented the grain offering
and burned it on the altar
besides the burnt offering of the morning
